home.title: Welcome
home.description: Welcome to my blog, where I share notes from my readings on articles and books. I also plan to share my trip stories and experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Currently, at Solace, I'm part of a talented team on a mission to create the world's best smart home experience. Previously, I worked in a research lab focused on AI and Machine Learning, participated in national and international UAV competitions. I hold a B.S. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering from Boğaziçi University and graduated from Kabataş High School. For more information, you can check my LinkedIn profile.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description:
